title: Problem with reconnect.
body:
I just go into a custom game and then exit this, and it says forwards "Reconnect" when i try to recconect ... it says with a black screen and the logo of LoL on the middle of the screen : "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game." And this going over and over.
What can i do?
